The following are ciphertexts encrypted using two different techniques. For each ciphertext, 
analyze and identify the ciphering technique used (1 point), give the corresponding plaintext and the used key (1 point), 
write programming code for decryption (2 points). 
Use either C, C++, Java, or Python.
